description: Salah is the second pillar of Islam and the most important form of worship. It is obligatory for every adult Muslim and is performed five times a day at prescribed times. Salah involves physical movements, specific recitations, and spiritual focus directed entirely toward Allah.

importance.text: Indeed, I am Allah. There is no deity except Me, so worship Me and establish prayer for My remembrance.
Verily, the prayer is enjoined on the believers at fixed hours.

types_of_prayer.witr: Odd-numbered prayer after Isha, recommended to end the day
types_of_prayer.janazah: Funeral prayer with no ruku or sujood

invalidators: Turning away from Qibla without reason

hadiths.text: The first matter that the slave will be brought to account for on the Day of Judgment is the prayer. If it is sound, then the rest of his deeds will be sound.
Between a man and shirk and kufr is the abandonment of prayer.
Pray as you have seen me praying.

benefits: Connects you with Allah five times a day
Strengthens community when prayed in congregation
recommended_etiquettes: Pray at the beginning of its time
Use a clean place and prayer mat
